website_summaries.verdict: These drops are a must-have for allergy sufferers who need to combat eye redness.
pros: These drops work quickly and are known to soothe eyes all day long after 1 use
Single bottle is long-lasting, as it doesn’t take many drops to see and feel results
Especially effective in ridding eyes of redness associated with seasonal allergies
cons: It’s hard to get liquid out of the bottle once it’s running really low

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops.
customer_reviews.text: Only eye drops my husband will use. My husband can't go anywhere without these. He has pretty sensitive eyes, and only has found these to help. He uses them with and without his contacts.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best allergy eye drops.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that will soothe my eye allergies to makeup. I have not been able To pinpoint what exactly causes my eyes to get red and burn but this helps soothe it if i need to put makeup and deal with it! It takes all the red out and makes your eyes really white. This is my go to.
customer_reviews.author: YoungFamily

customer_reviews.title: For really strong itchy eyes, this product only works for a moment at a time
customer_reviews.text: When I found myself trying to calm the insane itching of my eyes by applying Naphcon A eyedrops every 30 min, I knew I'd found another product that didn't work. I remember years ago there was a different ingredient (hydroflouric acid) and those eye drops worked, but times and research change and we're left with a pretty useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Fitts

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my eyes from itching
customer_reviews.text: Be careful--you can't use these more than a few times in a day. When I use them more than a few times a day (more than three--one drop each eye) then I get a foreign object feeling in my eyes. Still, during allergy season, I depend on these to prevent itching.
customer_reviews.author: K O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops
customer_reviews.text: Best eye drops ever. It’s like magic. If you have red eyes very quickly after application they will be white.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Miracle eye drops
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to eye drops! I call them miracle drops. They work wonders. I had a cyst on my eyeball a few weeks ago. My mother thought I would have to get it removed but I ordered these drops, used them multiple times per day for almost 2 weeks and the cyst drained and shrunk until it went away.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Didn't do anything, back to Simisalan eye drops for me, they r better for allergy itching
customer_reviews.text: Nada, huge bottle but was just like putting water in my eyes. I have just had mild allergy itching & mild crust in mornings, tried this because of RAVE reviews, but truly didn't help a bit. Tried using it 6 days 3x a day...NO HELP at all. Tried Simisalan and in 2 uses, I've got relief. Try that instead, this stuff doesn't do squat
customer_reviews.author: MadWifeHousekeeping

customer_reviews.title: Best eyedrops in the game
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these eyedrops for years. I have bad allergies especially in my eyes. These eyedrops have actual antihistamine properties so it's helping to fight off allergies not just mask the symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: pdx503-kr

customer_reviews.title: Eye drop with cloudy solution. Waste money!
customer_reviews.text: The product solution is cloudy which should not be used based on the instruction on the package label. Amazon do not allow to return this item. Totally waste the money for ordering this eye drop. Better to get it from local Walmart pharmacy or CVS.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for my dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best eye drops I have found for my dry eyes. Important note however! If you wear contacts, apply these drops after inserting your contacts and never ever use it on the inside of the lens to reinsert, as it will cause your eye to dilate.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Definately takes the red out, it stings a little when using for allergy eyes. I use this for my son who has sick hayfever. It also works well with pool eyes from chloirne. I usually clean his eyes with an allergy eyewash first and then put 1-2 drops of Naphcon in each eye. Works like a charm every time and is better and hopefully safer than rx eye drops...that don't work! He usually experiences complete relief in 10 -15 minutes. This is now a spring and summer staple in my house and it's a decent sized bottle that has lasted us over a year. Good buy!

However, after a few hours my eyes usually look worse than before and I’m terrified to use them too many days in a row for fear that my eyes will just look more and more red after discontinuing use. I try to only use these when absolutely necessary and only once in the day.

These are my eyes tired for 16 hours and the second pic is 30 seconds or less after applying 1 drop in each eye. yeah, go ahead and buy :) just go ahead.

They don’t burn (unless my eyes are freakishly dry then there’s a slight sting for a few seconds) and my eyes look so white and feel so refreshed after. It’s like I took my eyes out and put them in a mystical bath of pure liquid magic. I will never buy any other eye drops again. I highly recommend these eye drops!

customer_reviews.title: dilated my eyes!!!!!!

Took a look at my eyes and the pupil was huge! Next day as a test I just did it in one eye and yes its the drop. This is a rare S.E. and only happens in sensitive individual which I guess I am....

I've tried Visene and other big name brands, but this is the only one that works. It burns a little, but then clears up and works every time. It's worth the extra money!!

customer_reviews.title: Great eyedrops for itchy burning eyes.
customer_reviews.text: These Naphcon-A eyedrops are the only ones I use. I use The eyedrops every day and have for many years. They are hard to find locally so I always order them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus Wren

customer_reviews.title: Stops itching and redness from allergies almost instantaneously
customer_reviews.text: My family and I get really bad allergies and oral antihistamines like allegra, claritin, and zyrtec aren't very effective for us just saps our energy. The best combination we've found for allergies as been the combination of a nasal spray like patanase and/or nasonex for nasal symptoms plus naphcon A for eye symptoms. Pretty much anything with Naphazoline and Pheniramine will be effective, but I trust Alcon to get the solution perfect every single time. This is not an eye moisturizer, and it's not for eye infections like pinkeye. It stops itchy, teary eyes from allergies in its tracks.

customer_reviews.title: Just wow! <3

product_meta.title: Naphcon-A Eye Drops, 15-mL
product_meta.description: Size:15-mLTemporarily relieving itchy, red eyes caused by allergies to things such as pollen, ragweed, grass, or animal hair and dander.
feature_bullets: Naphcon-A is a decongestant and antihistamine combination
The decongestant constricts (narrows) the blood vessels, which reduces eye redness
The antihistamine works by blocking the action of histamine, which helps reduce symptoms such as watery, itchy eyes
